titleStmt.title: An epistle of peace and good-will unto all the children of the Lord against this suffering time
titleStmt.author: Crook, John, 1617-1699.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: creased, torn, and tightly bound, with loss of print; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin University.
